item.title: Contact
item.description: Address: Oskar Morgenstern Platz 1, Conference room 14 Social: (Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/statisticon/ WhatsApp: https://chat.whatsapp.com/CuiRUZvYS1Z7LqKV7f4lTu )

item.title: Timetable
item.description: Browse the full schedule below. Wed, 24 Sep 2025 Time Speaker Topic 09:00-09:30 - Introduction 09:30-10:30 Georg Köstenberger Introduction to basic concepts of timeseries analysis 10:45-11:45 Daniel Peer Intuitive aspects of linear algebra 12:00-13:45 - Lunch 14:00-14:45 Tracy Ndongala On the Kullback-Leiber-Divergence and it's statistical applications 15:00-15:30 Laetitia Fritz, Sarah Dvorak, Aruuke Ydrysova Regression to the Data: Students on Non-Parametric Regression Thu, 25 Sep 2025 Time Speaker Topic 09:30-10:30 Razvan-Andrei Morariu Statistical methods can outperform complex machine learning 10:45-11:45 Daniel Obszelka Überblick über Monte-Carlo Simulations- und Samplingtechniken 12:00-13:45 - Lunch 14:00-14:30 Lorenzo Salvi Introduction to the Jackknife and Bootstrap Methods 14:45-15:15 Lorenzo Salvi Introduction to Survival Analysis 15:30-18:00 Panel Networking Event Fri, 26 Sep 2025 Time Speaker Topic 10:00-11:00 Daniel Obszelka Überblick über Monte-Carlo Simulations- und Samplingtechniken 11:15-12:15 Luca Gonzato Introduction to Bayesian filtering and state-space models 12:30-13:00 Tihomir Todorov Application of Statistical Methods in Text Classification 14:45-15:15 Lorenz Matz You may peek at the data now: Anytime-Valid Inference and Safe Statistics 13:55-18:00 - Lunch/Discussion/Excursion
